main.heading: Description
main.body: The Conclave of Light is an organization of elven figures operating in secret from within the elven domain of Ylsera.

main.heading: Description
main.body: The Strangers are a group of professional thieves, assassins, and rogues who deal with many different covert operations.

main.heading: Disguises
main.body: Many who join the ranks of the Strangers undergo 'indistinction', a process which involves the removal or concealing of distinguishing physical traits. The purpose of 'indistinction' is to rid oneself of traits that would be easy to spot in a crowd, or to make the application of disguises and makeup easier.
